mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_email, user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_zipcode, user_address, user_address_detail,user_address_etc,user_bank,user_bank_account) VALUES (#{userEmail},#{userName},#{userPassword},#{userPhone},#{userZipcode}, #{userAddress},#{userAddressDetail},#{userAddressEtc},#{userBank},#{userBankAccount})
